channel.title: Resource Plugins on Omniview - The Integration DevOps Environment
channel.description: Recent content in Resource Plugins on Omniview - The Integration DevOps Environment

item.title: Overview
item.description: Resource plugins enable interaction with and management of various infrastructure resources. These plugins can list, create, update, delete, and watch resources, providing a seamless interface for infrastructure management within Omniview. warning Omniview is under heavy active development - the ResourcePlugin SDK is subject to frequent breaking changes until the first stable release.
